about: Create a pull request to merge changes into the main branch.
title: '[TYPE] Short description of the change'
labels: ''
assignees: ''
---

## Description

Please provide a detailed description of the changes introduced in this pull request. Explain the problem it solves, the solution implemented, and any relevant context.

## Related Issues

Link to any related issues or tasks:

- #ISSUE_NUMBER

## Type of Change

Please mark the relevant options with an `x` in the brackets:

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Refactor (code improvement or restructuring without changing external behavior)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Other (please specify)

## How Has This Been Tested?

Describe the testing you performed to ensure your changes work correctly. Provide details on how to reproduce the testing steps if necessary.

- [ ] Unit tests
- [ ] Integration tests
- [ ] Manual testing (describe steps)

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines.
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code.
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas.
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation.
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings.
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or my feature works.
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes.

## Screenshots/Videos (if applicable)

If your changes involve UI or visual elements, please include screenshots or a short video demonstrating the changes.
